metadata.title: CVE-2016-7389 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
For the NVIDIA Quadro, NVS, GeForce, and Tesla products, NVIDIA GPU DisplayDriver on Linux R304 before 304.132, R340 before 340.98, R367 before367.55, R361_93 before 361.93.03, and R370 before 370.28 contains avulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvidia.ko) handler for mmap() whereimproper input validation may allow users to gain access to arbitraryphysical memory, leading to an escalation of privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcuda1-304 - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libcuda1-304-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-304 - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-304-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-current - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-libopencl1-304 - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-libopencl1-304-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-opencl-icd-304 - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
nvidia-opencl-icd-304-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
No subscription required

nvidia-304-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.12.04.1
nvidia-current-updates - 304.132-0ubuntu0.12.04.1
nvidia-experimental-304 - 304.132-0ubuntu0.12.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-173: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '304.132-0ubuntu0.14.04.2').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '304.132-0ubuntu0.12.04.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '340.98-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340-updates package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '340.98-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-352 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '367.57-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-352-updates package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '367.57-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
